home.title: Bulk Send
home.description: Send bulk marketing messages to your contacts
home.mmlite_disclaimer: Switch to MM Lite API now to accelerate your growth and gain full delivery control. <button class="highlight">See more</button>

total_sent.label: Total sent
total_sent.hint: Total number of messages sent through bulk sends within the selected period.

estimated_total_cost.label: Estimated total cost
estimated_total_cost.hint: Estimated cost based on the number of messages sent. Final pricing may vary according to Meta‚Äôs billing.

success_rate.label: Success rate
success_rate.hint: Percentage of contacts who successfully received messages, calculated from the total number of unique contacts targeted across all campaigns.

no_recent_sends.title: Start sending personalized template messages to your contacts at scale
no_recent_sends.subtitle: It takes less than 2 minutes to set up your first send.

recent_sends.title: Recent Sends

sent.label: Sent
sent.hint: Number of sends processed by platform Weni and forwarded to Meta.

delivered.label: Delivered
delivered.hint: Messages confirmed as delivered to the user‚Äôs device. Note: not all users allow delivery status to be shared. For privacy reasons, those cases are not included.

estimated_cost.label: Estimated cost
estimated_cost.hint: Estimated value based on a unit cost of {currency} {cost} per template. Note: this calculation does not include different pricing models, exchange rate variations, or taxes.

read.label: Read
read.hint: Number of messages confirmed as read by the recipient. Note: not all users allow read status to be shared. For privacy reasons, those cases are not included.

clicked.label: Clicks
clicked.hint: Messages that were accepted and sent by Meta.

failed.label: Failed
failed.hint: Failed sends, which may occur either during processing in Weni or delivery by Meta. Various factors can cause failure (e.g., invalid number, inactive WhatsApp account, temporary instability).

recent_sends.empty_text: We couldn‚Äôt find any sends matching your search

new_contact_group.disclaimer: This group will contain {contactCount} contacts from the {category} results of {broadcastName} campaign.
new_contact_group.title: New contact group
new_contact_group.name: Group name
new_contact_group.error_alert: Group creation failed, please try again

activate_mmlite.title: Update to MM Lite API
activate_mmlite.main_subtitle: üöÄ MM Lite API is here: reach more people, with smarter delivery
activate_mmlite.why_subtitle: Why switch to the MM Lite API?
activate_mmlite.more_messages_label: ¬∑ More messages delivered, with less effort
activate_mmlite.seamless_label: ¬∑ Seamless transition with your current setup

main_description.text: The MM Lite API is an upgrade from the Cloud API, designed to {0}. Now, you can send smarter campaigns ‚Äî all with minimal changes to your current setup.

activate_mmlite.more_messages_description: MM Lite delivers an equal or greater number of messages than the Cloud API. High engagement messages expected, relevant, and timely are prioritized and can reach more people.
activate_mmlite.engagement_description: Templates with high open and click rates automatically reach even more users without requiring changes to your sending strategy.
activate_mmlite.seamless_description: Keep using your existing numbers and templates. The switch requires minimal integration effort and keeps the same pricing model as Cloud API.

footer.text: ‚ÑπÔ∏è Information provided by Meta. See {0} for full details and updates.

activate_mmlite.success_alert: Successfully requested MM Lite API activation

list.item_1: Save your file in XLSX, XLS or CSV format
list.item_2: Include a header row with the supported column names (see below)
list.item_3: Your file can contain up to 300,000 rows
list.item_4: Blank cells will be ignored. To clear a value, use --
list.item_5: Additional columns will be ignored unless prefixed with Field:

footer.title: You can {0} template to help you get started
